data.name: RPG Maker MZ - High Fantasy Generator Pack for MZ
data.detailed_description:
Replace all the default generator materials with illustrations with a realistic touch.
This collection of character generator materials is perfect for creating a profound world view!
It allows you to create characters with a realistic touch that you can't find anywhere else.

※Please make sure to back up the generator folder before use.
　This product is a collection of materials that can be used by replacing the materials in the generator folder.

*******************************************
■Included materials■

This software includes enough materials to replace all of the materials used in the face graphics section of the character generator.
You can create characters with a realistic touch like no other.
In addition, there are materials that are not included in the default package.

More than 473 male parts
More than 412 female parts
More than 350 children's parts

*******************************************
